01.headline: Rubic
01.summary: Odosprotocol added in Rubic. Provides routing options to base, zksync era, optimism, etc.

01.headline: LiFi
01.summary: Spot and perp futures exchange, print3r integrated with LiFi.

01.headline: Wormhole
01.summary: Wormhole ZK. Upgrade in message verification.

01.headline: Chainlink
01.summary: Cross-chain swap powered by Chainlink - XSwap.

01.headline: Squid
01.summary: Squid Raises $4m in Strategic Funding Round led by Polychain Capital.

01.headline: Cashmere
01.summary: Unified cross-chain liquidity layer between EVM and non-EVM ecosystems.

01.headline: Picasso Network
01.summary: Marginfi collaborating to integrate lst and utilize it in Solana restaking layer.

01.headline: Pike Finance
01.summary: Mainnet live. Borrow, lend, leverage, and earn across any chain. Access liquidity from across all of DeFi, natively.

02.headline: Dymension
02.summary: Wormhole will be integrating Dymension. Users can transfer their assets to RollApps and leverage Dymension's shared liquidity.

02.headline: Arkham
02.summary: Arkham will be providing data on over $173M of Total Value Locked (TVL), as well as the over 2.6M unique addresses on-chain.

02.headline: Bridge
02.summary: Fully on-chain, transparent and permissionless design of Bridge.

05.headline: Farcaster
05.summary: Introducing Ferps - Simplifying the future of Finance. One-click long/short positions, smart wallets, and gas fees are covered, courtesy of @biconomy and @FetcchX.

05.headline: Particle
05.summary: Launchpad is now live. MerlinLayer2 is the first project on the launchpad. A Native Bitcoin Layer2 powered by BitMapTech, building upon the native assets, protocols, and products on Bitcoin Layer1, to make BTC fun again.

05.headline: Orbiter
05.summary: Berachain testnet integrated into orbiter finance. An EVM-equivalent L1 built on the Cosmos SDK and powered by Proof of Liquidity.

05.headline: XY Finance
05.summary: XY finance, bridge aggregator integrated AcrossProtocol.

05.headline: AltLayer
05.summary: First provider to build and support Arbitrum orbit with EigenDA.

05.headline: Buildadera
05.summary: Kodiak raised $2M in seed round and incubated by buildabera. Berachain's native liquidity hub.

06.headline: ENS and DNS
06.summary: Web Registry GoDaddy, Ethereum Name Service Connect Domain Names With Crypto Wallets. Users will be able to link their internet domain names to their ENS addresses.

06.headline: Sudoswap
06.summary: Sudoswap is now live on Base.

06.headline: Oxngmi's new Dapp
06.summary: Allows token swaps without initial ETH. it uses permits to do a swap that requires no initial ETH, so you can get your first ETH.

06.headline: Dymension
06.summary: Mainnet is live. Validators were not able to reach consensus because there was a bad validator in the set. Chorus One, with 34.8% of the staked tokens delegated to it.

06.headline: Hypr Network
06.summary: Collaborating with hyperlane to bring permissionless interoperability and bridging to the ecosystem.

06.headline: Hyperlane and hashi-based Interchain Security Module
06.summary: The new Hashi-ISM allows Hyperlane Apps to access Hashi’s 17+ adapters for additive security. By specifying the Hashi ISM, message recipients can leverage Hashi’s additive security and have their message verified by multiple cross-chain rails.

06.headline: LayerZero
06.summary: Gelato bringing L0 v2 to all Gelato RaaS solving interoperability in a world of hundreds of thousands of L2s, App Chains, & Rollups.

06.headline: 4 buzz words in Crypto
06.summary: Arjun from LiFi shares some insights on currently trending tech and word in the space. Interop, Modularity, RWA and AI.

07.headline: Succinct Network
07.summary: The Protocol for Programmable Truth. A decentralized prover network where provers compete for the privilege of generating your ZK proof.

07.headline: Astar Network
07.summary: Astar zkEVM will plug into Polygon's Aggregation Layer and LxLy bridge.

07.headline: SuperVerse
07.summary: SUPER is going cross-chain through integration with LayerZero.

07.headline: LiFi
07.summary: Flooz integrates with LiFi. Traders can now swap their assets across 8+ chains supported by LiFi.

07.headline: deBridge
07.summary: deBridge IaaS is officially live. Neon_EVM as the first user. Any team can make their ecosystem instantly accessible from EVM or SVM chains with single subscription.

07.headline: ChainFlip
07.summary: Introduces chainflipBot. It keeps track of swaps, liquidity movements and validator stats.

08.headline: Axelar Network
08.summary: No code Interchain Token service. Enables quick creation or transformation of tokens across different blockchain networks. Facilitates 1:1 token bridging across all EVM chains supported by Axelar.

08.headline: LayerZero
08.summary: Angle Protocol transitions to a fully on-chain governance setup leveraging layerzero for cross chain voting.

08.headline: PersistenceOne
08.summary: Brings restaking to cosmos. Along with restaking comes 'leveraged' restaking by borrowing LSTs.

08.headline: Meson
08.summary: Cross-chain support to Conflux Network's Bitcoin Layer2 solution. Seamless BTC cross-chain swap between Conflux's Bitcoin L2 and other blockchains, further strengthening the adoption of BTC assets.

08.headline: Socket
08.summary: 1M ARB for socket ecosystem. 700k for any bridges in Socket APIs, SDK, or Plugin. 300k for bridging to arbitrum and orbit chains. From Feb 12th to March 31st.

08.headline: Superform Labs
08.summary: Raised $6.5M. Live in early access on 7 chains. Superform is The Universal Yield Marketplace. Users: Discover vaults, manage positions, and get instant access using any token from any chain.

08.headline: deBridge
08.summary: Zeta markets integrated deBridge widget, opening up virtually instant deposits from 9 chains to high-speed perp trading on Solana.

08.headline: Infrared - Berachain
08.summary: Understanding iBGT: The Future of Liquid Staking on Berachain. Infrared Berachain Governance Token(iBGT) further enhances BGT’s utility by providing a liquid wrapper that simplifies a few complexities of PoL.

09.headline: Owlto
09.summary: To be listed in Binance web3 wallet.

09.headline: Meson
09.summary: Partnership with joy protocol, a passkey wallet that streamlines your entry into web3.

09.headline: LiFi
09.summary: Nest Wallet has integrated lifiprotocol to enable cross chain swaps across 8 chains and L2s. Nest Wallet serves wallet security using on-chain 2FA.

09.headline: Restaking Players
09.summary: KelpDAO, Picasso, SSV, Pendle, RestakeFi, Renzo, etc.

13.headline: Picasso
13.summary: Integrating RaydiumProtocol LP tokens into Restaking layer on solana.

13.headline: Axelar Network
13.summary: Interchain Token Service can create a new interchain token with custom features. It allows to register an existing ERC20 as Interchain Token. And Register or link a multichain set of native tokens.

13.headline: RGB++
13.summary: Extension of RGB protocol along with single use seals and client side validation techniques. It introduces transaction folding, shared state and ownerless contracts without the need of cross chain transactions.

13.headline: Biconomy
13.summary: Introduces Biconomy SDK V4 with 50% less code for same performance, optimized packages, bundler size reduced by 40%, etc.

13.headline: Astar Network
13.summary: dApp staking v3 is live on astar network.

13.headline: Symbiosis
13.summary: Fee discounting system for veSIS Holders.

13.headline: Avail
13.summary: Partnership with Ternoa. Ternoa will be using Avail DA to buld their zkEVM L2.

13.headline: LiFi
13.summary: wigwam crypto wallet integrates with lifi.

13.headline: Linea
13.summary: Ajira Pay Finance is live on Linea. Ajira Pay is a multichain protocol for crytpo payments

13.headline: UniLend Finance
13.summary: UniLend V2 is live in Ethereum mainnet. UniLend is multichain permissionless lending and borrowing protocol for all ERC20 tokens.

14.headline: Chainlink
14.summary: Tokenized RWA markets are fragmented. CCIP maximizes the liquidity of tokenized RWAs.

14.headline: Rango
14.summary: Partnership with exodus wallet. XO swaps integrated into Rango. And Rango's API will be integrated into Exodus.

14.headline: Wormhole
14.summary: 6 startups utilizing wormhole's cross chain messaging protocol. Intentify is an intent-centric middle layer for dApps. Lucidity is a cross-chain money market aggregator. Seshat simplifies the complex tasks of on-chain data and predictive model engineering for web3 infrastructure. Scholes enables user-priced options minting and trading with optimal liquidity through aggregation. Temporal is an institutional-grade liquidity layer for yield markets. Zoth is an ecosystem that connects liquidity and RWAs across traditional finance & Onchain finance.

14.headline: Berachain
14.summary: Berachain partnership with LayerZero to connect Berachain to 50+ other chains, serving as the canonical bridge solution for beras.

14.headline: Prisma Finanace
14.summary: Introducing $ULTRA, sound money backed by LRTs. $ULTRA is a stablecoin issued by PrismLRT, a new borrowing protocol developed by Prisma focused on unlocking liquidity for LRTs.

15.headline: Conduit
15.summary: Rollups deployment in mainnet live. Choose your tech stack by selecting a framework, settlement layer, and data availability.

15.headline: Dymension
15.summary: Ecosystem explorer for Dymension devnet chains. Support for Mainnet coming soon. Free block explorer for any Dymension rollApps.

15.headline: Picasso
15.summary: Partnership with Rome. Rome’s sequencer will be powered by Picasso’s restaking layer and will have access to cross-chain liquidity through the Solana IBC connection.

15.headline: Chainflip
15.summary: Cross-chain swaps available within farcaster app processed by chainflip.

15.headline: LiFi
15.summary: Strategic partnership with Equalizer Finance. A flash loan service. LiFi's Meta Aggregator will be using their tech.

15.headline: Cake Framework
15.summary: Chain Abstraction framework. Consists of four layers - Applications, Permissions, Solving, and Settlement.

15.headline: Bungee
15.summary: Introducing LST bridging with Rocker Pool.

15.headline: Celestia
15.summary: Syndicate Frame chain, an OP stack L3 on Base with Celestia underneath increasing throughput and decreasing gas cost for farcaster frame developers.

16.headline: LayerZero
16.summary: KelpDAO has integrated LayerZero to introduce omnichain capabilities for rsETH.

16.headline: Linea
16.summary: Integrates with GraphProtocol. A protocol for organizing and accessing blockchain data.

16.headline: Map
16.summary: Map Protocol partnering with B squared network, merlin chain, BEVM and IERC20 to bring Bitcoin style peer to peer interop between the BTC exosystem and EVM and non EVm ecosystem.

16.headline: Connext
16.summary: Connext live on Base. Renzo users will soon be able to restake ETH on Base without ever interacting with Ethereum.

16.headline: Biconomy
16.summary: Partnership with NFTperp. One click NFT perp trading on Blast L2 with session keys.

20.summary: Linea park is live until April 2nd, 2024.

20.headline: Axelar
20.summary: Native restaking available in Bedrock with the help of Interchain Token.

20.headline: Fuel
20.summary: Mintair Integrates with fuel. Deploying a Fuel node is a click away with mintair.

20.headline: LiFi
20.summary: Solana live on Jumper. Users can bridge USDT and USDC between EVM chains and Solana.

20.headline: Axelar
20.summary: Zeeve RaaS integrates with Axelar to bring programmable cross chain interoperability to L2.

20.headline: Dymension
20.summary: Modular Liquidity Layer. Dymension is now a settlement AND liquidity layer. Shared liquidity on top of shared security. For each swap 0.3% fee is charged. 0.2% is directed as revenue for LPs. 0.1% is swapped to DYM and burned as a protocol fee.

21.headline: EigenLayer
21.summary: Partnership with Fluentxyz. Developers will be able to launch customized chains with full wasm/evm compatibility.

21.headline: LayerZero
21.summary: LayerZero live on Xai. Xai is a L3 blockchain on Arbitrum orbit stack built for web3 gaming. L0 will serve as Xai's Data Availability committee.

21.headline: Owlto
21.summary: Micro3io partners with owlto. Micro3io is a NFT platform empowring users, artists and content creators to explore boundless creativity across multi-chain.

21.headline: Succinct
21.summary: Introduction to SP1 Reth. A POC that showcases how any rollup can build a performant, type 1 zkEVM with < 2000 lines of maintainable Rust code using SP1.

21.headline: Wormhole
21.summary: Wormhole added AMD as hardware accelerator provider to make enterprise grade hardware available to the wormhole ZK ecosystem for trustless interop.

21.headline: zkSync
21.summary: Slush Joins Matter Labs to Play a Critical Role in Advancing the Hyperchain Ecosystem for ZK Stack

22.headline: Flare
22.summary: Announces partnership with Sindric Solutions to launch XDFi. A decentralized futures protocol created by Wall Street veterans.

22.headline: Particle
22.summary: Modular smart wallet as a service is live on berachain. berachain builders can build with full stack Account abstraction

22.headline: Neutro Grants
22.summary: Announcement of Neutron Grants Program's second batch.

22.headline: Meson 🤝 Ancient8
22.summary: Ancient8 launched its mainnet and integrated in Meson.

22.headline: Nigeria bans Crypto firms
22.summary: This move comes just months after the Central Bank of Nigeria lifted its ban on crypto transactions, signaling a tumultuous regulatory landscape for digital assets in the country.
